title: Possibility of a Lore Section
body: I was just wondering if there were any plans to add a section of the client that contains the lore of LoL. Something that would include the whole new Shurima Lore, Targon, Bilgewater, etc, along with the individual champion lores. Maybe it could be part of the collection, once that becomes the area of focus.

replies.body: This is a good idea. We've got a bunch of things to do before we start looking into new features though.
I love this idea, though Riot A Huevo has a good point in that there is a lot of additional work we need to do first before we can start tackling new features.

Yes, I would also love to be able to read whole stories of each champion, instead of just one little part

Had to bump it :P
